articles.title: India calls killings in Rafah ‘heartbreaking’, reaffirms Palestinian statehood amid European moves - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India reiterated its long-standing support for Palestinian statehood following the recent recognition of Palestine by Ireland, Norway, and Spain. | World News
articles.content: India on Thursday reaffirmed its long-standing position on the Israeli-Palestinian conflict following the recent recognition of Palestine by Ireland, Norway, and Spain. Ministry of External Affairs s… [+2946 chars]
